  • Classes in ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster used by ch.supertomcat.bh.gui.adder 
    Class and Description
    IHostURLCheckerListener
    Listener for the Adder-Panel to detect when the URLs are parsed or to update the Progressbar.
  • Classes in ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster used by ch.supertomcat.bh.gui.hoster 
    Class and Description
    Host
    Class which all hostclasses have to extend
    IRedirect
    Interface which all redirect-classes have to implement
  • Classes in ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster used by ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster 
    Class and Description
    Host
    Class which all hostclasses have to extend
    Hoster
    Host and Rule extends this class, so we have a class which could be a Host or a Rule.
    HostManager
    Class which holds the host-classes and provides methods to check and parse the URLs There is also a method which removes duplicates from an URL-Array
    HostRules
    Host-Class for Rules
    IHoster
    Interface which all host-classes have to implement
    IHostURLCheckerListener
    Listener for the Adder-Panel to detect when the URLs are parsed or to update the Progressbar.
    IRedirect
    Interface which all redirect-classes have to implement
    RedirectManager
    Class which holds the redirect-classes
    URLParseObject
    This class is used as arguments for parsing the urls
  • Classes in ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster used by ch.supertomcat.bh.pic
